task:
Attached is an annotated mouse brain AnnData object with cell type annotations stored in `adata.obs['predicted_cell_type']`. For the cell type classified as 'Microglia', perform a 1-vs-all Wilcoxon differential expression test against all other cell types. Sort genes by log fold change (descending), then Wilcoxon score (descending), filter for adjusted p-value < 0.05, and report the Top-20 ranked genes for the 'Microglia' population. Do not invent or simulate gene names.

ALWAYS output your final answer EXACTLY in the following format:
<EVAL_ANSWER>
{
  "top_marker_genes": ["Gene1", "Gene2", ..., "Gene20"]
}
</EVAL_ANSWER>

scoring.set_definition: Compare the agent's Top-20 predicted microglia marker genes to the canonical set. Precision@20 = |pred ∩ canon| / 20. Recall@20 = |pred ∩ canon| / |canon|.
scoring.description: Passes only if both Precision@20 ≥ 0.60 and Recall@20 ≥ 0.50.
